entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 22.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with a few showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 22. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and overnight. Showers beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
